Reviews.Title: “A hotel on the mend”
Reviews.Author: mitchcolgan
Reviews.Content: im pleased recent stay hotel edward ups biggest challenge encountered hotel currently transition upgrade means nice stylish lift didnt workers pounding beginning morning lobby checked hotel told 5th floor shouldnt elevator wasnt lug bags narrow steps fortunately receptionist nice able change 1st floor remainder trip avoid heart attack stairs wireless internet free throughout day switch 1st floor street bit noise drafty windows jet lagged barely noticed overall nice hotel fantastic location tube cant simple tube 5 minutes convenient

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!!”

Reviews.Content: hotels ive stayed londonthe little renovated modern waythe reception renovation location 1 block metro station lots pubs restaurants iti definetely

Reviews.Title: “Great location, surprisngly modern room, ideal for a couple.”
Reviews.Author: WheresNextT
Reviews.Content: partner arrived scaffolding building panicked slightly soon realised refurbishing hotel isnt special staff desk helpful leave backpacks checkin wasnt lockable cupboard ground floor builders bit awkward unsafe able check amazed brand refurbished modern clean bed 32 lcd television mounted wall usual teacoffee facilities sized modern clean bathroom didnt view night didnt matter breakfast average toast coco pops yogurts settled london bothered found nice little cafã© comparison price website cheap direct hotels website doesnt appear cheap managed bargain nights sleep deffinately

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed.”
Reviews.Author: jennifer_young200
Reviews.Content: welcome reception arrived worst experienced glum desk slowly putting stack papers barely acknowledged minute proceeded spend ages finishing task saying stupid day finally finished told name reservation gruffly stated price stay trying remain cheerful hed bad day mixed stupid payments pay didnt exactly fill confidence interview morning iron chap speak english didnt understand miming act ironing shirt dont advised check morning morning staff dealt request impressively ok apart mouldy shower curtain bathroom smell horrible curtains window foot short meant privacy blanket bottom curtain undress

Reviews.Title: “Awful hotel......bed bugs...faulty towers!'”
Reviews.Author: bedbugs_11
Reviews.Content: husband booked hotel jan 2011 royal wedding arrivedthe reception assistant didnt parking foreign didnt lift struggle 7 flights stairs husband bad wwas aching royal wedding day pain shower gel electrical sockets wiggled plug bit didnt arrive midnight bed started coat slept awful toaster soiled matress leaning dining booked 2 nights royal wedding checked outwe informed lift regularly broke itching offered thanks refund night didnt lost worst hotel stayed inand husband tiny bites ankles dayi wore socks thank refund parking paid saturday lost

Reviews.Title: “A Faulty Towers Aspect...”
Reviews.Author: cahro
Reviews.Content: hotel location excellent rates correct faulty towers aspect arrived hotel sunday night told elevator fixed tomorrow monday key 5th floor stairway fire doors major challenge luggage monday tuesday wednesday reception people giving stuck mighty hungry toaster breakfast bread toasted untoasted person duty didnt speak english understand happening numerous trips garbage pieces breakfast cloud smoke fire doors smoke wondered smoke didnt start ringing talk air extraction bathrooms

Reviews.Title: “RUDE KITCHEN STAFF”

Reviews.Content: hotel central price kitchen staff nasty arrived breakfast 915 cereal orange toast kitchen staff toaster toast informed breakfast milk tea told fridge breakfast

Reviews.Title: “cockroach in bath”
Reviews.Author: jugs1977
Reviews.Content: sister stayed location excellent planned 3 night stay look hotel looked nice staff friendly helpful am disabled helped front steps didnt eat hotel â£7 bit continental breakfast ok night found cockroach bath hadnt notice marble floor closer inspection round bath sink hadnt seen mop weeks complained day manageress refused speak hiding screen behing reception desk night refunded â£20

Reviews.Title: “Riddled with bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: LornaB1979
Reviews.Content: hotel location london hard rock calling hyde park ideal apart basically dump struggled accomodation reasonably priced booked hotel reading reviews leaving reviews saying bed bugs surely 1 week ago husband itchy lumps otherwise explained apparently bed bug bites upto 9 days appear theres pretty chance thats gross warned youre looking nice hotel romantic getaway avoid plague

Reviews.Title: “Hot, Hot, Hot!!”
Reviews.Author: Spencers2010
Reviews.Content: stayed edward hotel night hyde park calling concert hotel perfect location trendy london bars resturants etc street near hotel lovely houses pretty looks typical british movie hotelwe stayed london hottest day top floor window air whatsoever hardly slept finally fell asleep woken lift hotel tiny fashioned warm stay summer dont expect suffer

Reviews.Content: stayed convenience overnighter london booked relatively late handful reasonably priced hotels arrived 930pm waited 10 minutes served due receptionist trying helpful overseas student guest neverending list questions guest querying free wifi style hotel spruce tatty paintwork carpets various stores black bin liners laying reception initially keys poky twin wasnt double returned double 5 receptionist concerned suitable basement actually 5 twisty stairs round reception past vacuum cleaner passage appeared evening staff morning breakfast actually 5 reasonably spacious decently furnished recently decorated ensuite carpets clean initially noisy machinery space water running slept glad leave morning
